mapper.select:
select * from sys_white_ip t
1=1
and t.ip = #{p.ip}
and t.update_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{p.updateBy},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
